name: Haunted Mine (MrBaba)
description:
A game where you play a dwarf running through an dark haunted mine in quest of gold.

Find the pickaxe, and collect enough gold before being caught by the ghosts, but beware they are attracted by light.

Use ZQSD to move, enter to light the torches or to pick the pickaxe.
When the pickaxe is equipped, press enter to dig.

You can press F2 to start a new game when playing. (Can be usefull when softlocked, or if the procedural generation failled to generate a playable level which can occur rarely)

(The game can be slow in its current web browser version, please download the game for a more pleasant experience)
